Talk_44:

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hang on.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>If I remember correctly... You press this while you
pull this, and then you tap that, and...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Inspiration>Swordsman! Did you make room in your
pouch? I want to give you something
rare from the Depths!
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Boom.<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Now you should be able to use both the
<clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> and your <clr:0000>Hyrule Compendium<clr:ffff>.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, you!


I lost track of you down there! So, I
asked myself, where of ALL the places
he could have gone DID he go?
Look at me! I'm right! Here you are!


<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, how'd it go? Did you capture a
great picture of that <clr:0000>statue<clr:ffff>?
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So! Go capture a <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>of that statue!
This is a good chance to verify that it's
working properly too.
Test it out. Experience is the best teacher,
after all!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Once you've captured the image, come
back here. I'll want to see how it looks.
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This may even BE what it's showing.
In fact, I'm almost certain of it!

<snd:TalkPositive>So, capture an image of the statue with
your <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>, and then show it to me!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I feel as if these contain some kind of
strange power—like maybe it's energy
for something.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Anyway, they might help you in your
search for Princess Zelda. So hopefully
you find them useful!
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_03>But here, maybe this will help you out,
at least.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Admiration_03>That fragment has helped us <clr:0000>see the
Depths in a new way<clr:ffff>. Now we're closer to
understanding one of its mysteries!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey! You!


Show Josha the picture<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>you took of the
<clr:0000>statue<clr:ffff>. The figure matches up pretty
well—and it looks darn cool too!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_03>Thank you, Swordsman!


Just like on the slate, this figure must be
showing people of some sort, whoever
they were!
Which confirms my theory—that people
lived in the Depths!<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure we'll find
more traces of them if we keep searching.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>This is...


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_03>A BIG,<sp:5:0:0> BIG,<sp:5:0:0> BIG<sp:5:0:0> DISCOVERY!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Now, what's next!<sp:5:0:0> The possibilities...
There's so much more to research...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, <sp:5:0:0>but before I focus on that...


<snd:TalkPositive_00>There's something I want to give you
as thanks for helping with this stage of
my investigation.
Our earlier surveys of the Depths found
all of this. What do you think it's for?
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Hey, you! You're finally here!


Take a look at this.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm going to sift through everything
that our surveys have brought back from
down there.
Maybe there are even more fragments
that I can piece together!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>This statue...<sp:5:0:0> It's standing tall on two
legs, one arm raised high...

It looks an awful lot like the figure Josha
showed us on that piece of slate, don't
you think?
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?! What did you say?! You deleted
your <clr:0000>picture of the statue<clr:ffff>?!

<sp:3:0:2:0901>What were you thinking? After we went to
all that trouble to find it?

Josha's depending on us. So, go! Head
down there to take another picture!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh! Uh, yes!


Sorry, you were saying?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I was SAYING that I want <clr:0000>to go investigate
the Depths<clr:ffff>!

Look, if you're not gonna listen to me,
I'll go and jump into a <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>myself!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You don't know about the <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>? It's
one of the Purah Pad's basic features!

With the <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>, you can capture nearby
scenery as an image—one that's stored
in your pad there!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sounds like you still have more to learn
about the Purah Pad...

Well then, I'll teach you <clr:0000>how to take
pictures<clr:ffff>. Once we're down there, anyway.

There will be lots of monsters in <clr:0000>the
Depths<clr:ffff> though. So I'll be counting
on you to keep me safe.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Let's see...<sp:5:1:0> I guess we should enter
through the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of
Lookout Landing.
I'll go on ahead. Once you're ready and
rarin' to go, come find me there.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Ta-ta!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Come ON, Goggles! Are you even listening
to me?
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Um, your pouch is full, so I can't give you
the <clr:0000>zonaite <clr:ffff>that the survey team found
down there.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please make room in your pouch for <clr:0000>five
pieces of zonaite<clr:ffff>, and come back here!
Talk_90: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Even if it is, it's too dang dark!
Talk_91:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you've captured an image of that <clr:0000>statue<clr:ffff>
with your <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>, then hurry up and show
me! I'd like to see how it looks!
Talk_92:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I heard something about a potential
sighting of <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> at the castle...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I need to stay focused on my research
into <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.

That's where I'm sure we'll find a real clue
about what's happened to the princess!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>This is it! This does match what's on
the fragment!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, Swordsman! Sorry, I didn't mean to
leave you out of the conversation.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_93:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>Though there's been a sighting of the
<clr:0000>princess<clr:ffff> at the castle—allegedly—I know
searching there will prove fruitless!
<sp:3:0:2:0501><clr:0000>The Depths<clr:ffff> must hold the secret to her
location. We must continue our
investigations there.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Besides, Purah said she's in charge of
the castle investigation...

So, the Depths require our continued
attention!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This piece of slate. Specifically, the image
depicted on it.

<snd:Think_01>See that figure standing on two legs with
one arm raised up?

Well...<sp:5:0:0>I have a theory.


I think it could be evidence that a
mysterious people once lived in
the Depths.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_02>That's why I want to go <clr:0000>down there<clr:ffff>—so I
can see if there are any more depictions
like this one. I want to see for myself!
Talk_94:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll need you to take your Purah Pad
down there to get a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> of anything
we may find that resembles the <clr:0000>figure<clr:ffff>.
The <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> feature should make that
easy. Then we'll bring it back here
to Josha!
Talk_210:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Although, this time, Robbie grabbed me in
such a rush that I didn't gather enough
in advance...
Talk_211:
<snd:TalkPositive>If you're going to explore the Depths, take
plenty of those seeds with you.
Talk_80:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad>I won't be able to show you what I've
discovered with it this dark.
Talk_95:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Swordsman!


<snd:LaughL_00>Thank you so much for going to
investigate the Depths for me!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Our survey team brought back some
artifacts from a journey into <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.
One of them caught my eye.
Talk_81: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Now, let's get a better look at this thing!
Talk_09: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_03>Let me get you up to speed.
Talk_83:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If only that huge, glowing root was
providing more light...
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>If only that huge, glowing root could give
off more light!
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Purah and I worked together on the
design for the Purah Pad, but I'm the
one who put it together, you know.
We should've called it the Robbie Pad,
technically speaking.

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>But Purah went and slapped her own
name on it—grabbing all the glory!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Whatever. It's fine. Anyway, Josha
wanted to talk to me about something.
So I'm waiting for her right now.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Purah asked Josha to <clr:0000>research the
chasms<clr:ffff>. That's a big mission for such
a young person.
But she's a prodigy, you see. Puts the
rest of us full-grown adults to shame with
all she can do.
<snd:Think_01>Maybe she's discovered something that
even my imagination couldn't conjure!
Talk_201:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Are you Link?


Pleasure to meet you. I am Ponnick, from
the <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team<clr:ffff>.

<clr:0000>Robbie<clr:ffff> told me to guide you to him once
you arrived.

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>But he rushed along with such haste that
I didn't bring enough <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>,
and now I've run out.
So I lost sight of him...
Talk_71: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Is it true you've got the Purah Pad?
Talk_86:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We've set aside supplies for the Depths,
and you'll need to prepare, after all.
Talk_202:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Oh, that's no good at all. Light from the
surface doesn't reach down here, as you
might have noticed.
It's incredibly dangerous to explore here
without a light source.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You can easily get brightbloom seeds
from <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>, and they'll <clr:0000>light up if struck<clr:ffff>,
so they're pretty easy to use too.
We use the seeds all the time on the
Zonai Survey Team. The simplest way is
to <clr:0000>throw them with your hand<clr:ffff>.
Talk_203:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>Oh, that's great news. Light from the
surface doesn't reach down here, as you
might have noticed.
You'd be risking your life to wander here
without a light source, you know.

You can easily get brightbloom seeds
from <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>, and they'll <clr:0000>light up if struck<clr:ffff>,
so they're pretty easy to use too.
We use the seeds all the time on the
Zonai Survey Team. The simplest way is
to <clr:0000>throw them with your hand<clr:ffff>.
Talk_204:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I thought he was taking a short walk over
to that <clr:0000>glowing area <clr:ffff>over there.
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Inspiration>Sorry, can't talk now!


There's something I gotta discuss with
Goggles right away about our <clr:0000>research
into the chasms<clr:ffff>.
Let's talk later!
Talk_205:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you have any <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>
with you?
Talk_89:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>statue<clr:ffff> is right there! It's just like the
figure on that fragment Josha has.
Talk_75:

to me about.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, she's real young, but despite
that she was asked by Purah to <clr:0000>research
the chasms<clr:ffff>.
She's a prodigy, you see. Puts the rest of
us full-grown adults to shame with all she
can do.
Maybe she's discovered something that
even my imagination couldn't conjure!
Talk_206:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Robbie<clr:ffff> told me to guide you to him once
you arrived.

But he rushed along with such haste that
I didn't bring enough <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.

So I lost sight of him...
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, it's you! You're finally here!


I need to show you what I've found.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_03>The <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff> are pretty deep, so light from
the surface doesn't make it down there.
It's pitch black!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>But if you attach a <clr:0000>brightbloom seed <clr:ffff>to an
arrow and shoot it, it'll light up the area.
Definitely a useful trick down there!
Talk_208:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>and going...


And last I saw him, he was heading way
out there, off to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>.
Talk_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'm sure this statue is like the figure on
that fragment Josha has. This may even
BE what it's showing.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Use the <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> to capture an image of it.
Oh! When you take the picture, your view
has to be just right...<sp:5:0:0>to be perfect.
You'll make Josha very happy if you
bring back a great image.

Test it out. Experience really is the
best teacher!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Once you've captured the image, come
back here. I'll want to see how it looks.
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Hey, you—you're actually back! It's been
a long time!

Yeesh, do you have any idea how
worried we've been about you?
Purah told me everything!
Talk_209:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those of us skilled enough with a bow will
attach them to <clr:0000>arrows<clr:ffff> and fire them off
into the distance down here.
Talk_78:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Huzzah!


All right, then. Let's see it.
Talk_79:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Stupendous!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Looks like you've captured it well. I'm
sure Josha will be satisfied with this.
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Purah and I worked together on the
design, but I'm the one who put it
together, you know.
We should've called it the Robbie Pad,
technically speaking.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK, you'll want to head straight out of
Lookout Landing's <clr:0000>southern gate<clr:ffff>. You'll
find the chasm Goggles used just outside.
I don't know too much about how your
<clr:0000>camera <clr:ffff>works...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>But I'm counting on you to bring me that
<clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff>. Oh, and please look after <clr:0000>Goggles<clr:ffff>
for me!
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Hey, you! Is it true you've got the
Purah Pad?
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Josha, come on now...<sp:5:1:0>


Tell you what. I'll go down there myself
and see if I can't find anything about the
<clr:0000>figure<clr:ffff> on that <clr:0000>slate<clr:ffff>.
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_01>But I need more on that <clr:0000>figure<clr:ffff>! If we have
more info on it, then it should help us
better understand <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>!
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>We'll start by looking for <clr:0000>anything down
there that resembles the figure on
the slate<clr:ffff>.
Assuming we find what we're looking for,
we'll use your Purah Pad's <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> to take
a picture of it for Josha.<sp:5:1:0> A perfect plan!
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But Goggles here says it's too dangerous,
and he won't let me go.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>All right! Get that <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> of yours ready. 
It's time to put it to work.
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, it's you!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>You know, that Purah Pad of yours may
seem perfect... <sp:5:0:0>But it could be even
more perfect!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'll need to head back to the lab when
Josha's got <clr:0000>the Depths investigation<clr:ffff>
sorted out...
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can find the chasm that Goggles
headed for by going straight out of
Lookout Landing's <clr:0000>southern gate<clr:ffff>.
I think he plans to enter <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>
from there.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Sorry I can't tell you anything about how
that <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> works. I just know it captures
images that look like the real thing!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So if you find a <clr:0000>figure <clr:ffff>down there that
looks like the one I showed you, get a
<clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> of it for me, please!
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?!


Look at how bright that thing got!
That light down in this dark is
downright refreshing.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hm...<sp:5:1:0> In fact, it's so luminous, it's
almost like...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Like we're on the surface!


Just standing near it makes <clr:0000>me feel so
much better<clr:ffff>. How strange.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can barely make it out, but this
<clr:0000>statue <clr:ffff>here...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's standing tall on two legs, one arm
raised high...

It looks an awful lot like the figure Josha
showed us on that piece of slate, don't
you think?
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>No way, no how! You can't do that!


<clr:0000>The Depths<clr:ffff> are far too vast for you to
explore on your own. And we've only
barely begun to look into them.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd love to go gallivanting around down
there too—who knows what wonders
are at the bottom of those chasms!
<snd:Sad_01>But no matter how wondrous they may be,
it's far too dangerous for you.

<sp:3:0:2:0901>I'm not about to allow our young prodigy
to go wandering around somewhere so
unknown, so foul!
If anything were to happen to Purah's
favorite student, it'd be the end for me!<sp:5:0:0>
The END!
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's right! I forgot you hadn't used
the <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff> when we last spoke.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Very curious indeed, given it's one of
the Purah Pad's basic features.

Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> Give me that Purah Pad for a
second, all right?
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Looks like<sp:5:0:0> he's gone...


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm sorry you got roped into all of
this, Swordsman.

Goggles means well... But when he wants
to help me, he leaps before he looks.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>Lighting up that immense root...<sp:5:0:0> Getting
us a picture of the statue...

You've just started helping us research
what's down here, but soon enough we're
going to have even more to investigate.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well then, it's time I head back up to
the surface.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>See you at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>. Don't make
Josha wait too long for that picture!
